meanings.sent1: The marinas along the coast provide safe spots for small boats.
meanings.sent2: Many sailors enjoy docking their boats at the marinas in the bay.
meanings.sent3: The marinas were so full of boats, it looked like a floating parking lot!
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the marinas became a peaceful haven for the tiny boats.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flags fluttered in the breeze at the marinas, welcoming the boats.

meanings.definition: A place where boats are kept and serviced
meanings.sent1: Boat owners trust the marinas to store and maintain their vessels.
meanings.sent2: The marinas offer repair services for boats of all sizes.
meanings.sent3: The marinas were so busy, it seemed like a boat hospital!
meanings.sent4: In the marinas, boats were pampered like royalty in a floating spa.
meanings.sent5: The marinas buzzed with activity as boats were lifted in and out of the water.

meanings.definition: A facility with docks and supplies for boating
meanings.sent1: The marinas provide fuel, snacks, and other essentials for boaters.
meanings.sent2: Sailors rely on the marinas for all their boating needs.
meanings.sent3: The marinas were like a one-stop-shop for everything a boater could want!
meanings.sent4: At the marinas, boats were like shoppers browsing the aisles for supplies.
meanings.sent5: The marinas gleamed in the sunlight, beckoning boaters to dock and explore.
